SELECT o.patientcode, p.patientname as xm, p.id_sex as xb, u.user_name as sendPeople, group_concat( DISTINCT w.NAME ) as wsjg, o.send_date, o.id, o.back_date, us.user_name FROM md_outside_main o LEFT JOIN md_peispatient p ON o.patientcode = p.patientcode LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON o.send_people = u.user_no LEFT JOIN sys_user us ON o.back_people = us.user_no LEFT JOIN md_outside_charge_item oci ON o.patientcode = oci.patientcode LEFT JOIN md_wsjg w ON oci.wsjg_id = w.id
o.status = 1 AND (o.is_delete is null or o.is_delete = 0)
AND o.patientcode LIKE concat('%',#{param.patientcode},'%')
AND p.patientname LIKE concat('%',#{param.patientname},'%')
AND o.send_date >= #{param.startTime}
AND o.send_date <= #{param.endTime}
GROUP BY o.createdate, o.patientcode, p.patientname, p.id_sex, u.user_name, o.send_date, o.id, o.back_date, us.user_name ORDER BY o.createdate DESC
